pwa.offlineBody: Some features require an internet connection.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.hiddenHint: Dismissed notifications. Restore to show them again.

about.errorCopy: Please try again in a moment.
about.metaDescription: Learn about momentstudio and the story behind our handcrafted art.

restricted.title: Sign in required
restricted.copy: This page is available to signed-in customers only.

productGrid.empty: No products to show right now.

consent.required: Please read and accept the Terms & Conditions and Privacy Policy.

modal.title: Legal document

contact.title: Contact
contact.metaDescription: Get in touch with momentstudio for questions, custom orders, or support.
contact.errorCopy: Please try again in a moment.
contact.intro: Questions about an order, a custom piece, or a collaboration? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.replyTime: We typically reply within 1–2 business days.

form.title: Send a message
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help…
form.successCopy: Thanks for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Could not send your message. Please try again.

account.loadError: Unable to load account details right now.

unsaved.confirmDiscard: You have unsaved changes. Discard them and leave?

verification.sentStatus: Verification email sent. Enter the token you received.

cooldowns.username: Username can be changed again in {{time}}.
cooldowns.displayName: Display name can be changed again in {{time}}.
cooldowns.email: Primary email can be changed again in {{time}}.

publicIdentity.title: Public identity
publicIdentity.copy: How you appear in comments and other public activity.

privateInfo.title: Private account info
privateInfo.copy: Used for orders, support, and legal requirements.

username.helper: Use this to sign in and as a stable handle in public activity.

profile.sessionHint: Session timeout: 30m. Your theme is saved on this device; language is saved to your profile when signed in.

errors.dobFuture: Date of birth cannot be in the future.

aliases.loadError: Could not load your username/display name history.

export.title: Download my data
export.copy: Export your profile, orders, wishlist, and blog activity as JSON.
export.notifyCopy: We'll notify you when your export is ready.

analytics.title: Usage analytics
analytics.copy: Opt in to share anonymous usage statistics (sessions, cart, checkout, orders) to help improve the store.

deletion.title: Delete account
deletion.copy: Requesting deletion schedules your account to be removed after {{hours}} hours.
deletion.confirmCopy: Type DELETE to confirm. You can cancel during the {{hours}}h cooldown window.

consequences.logout: You'll be signed out from all devices.
consequences.anonymize: Your personal data will be anonymized.
consequences.noAccess: You will lose access to your account, orders, and coupons.
consequences.irreversible: This action can't be undone once completed.

messages.hidden: This comment was hidden by moderators.

security.subtitle: Manage password, emails, and connected accounts.

password.title: Password
password.copy: Change your password to keep your account secure.

twoFactor.title: Two-factor authentication
twoFactor.copy: Protect your account with an authenticator app and recovery codes.
twoFactor.setupHint: Add this account to your authenticator app, then enter a code to enable two-factor.
twoFactor.qrHint: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app.
twoFactor.recoveryCopy: Save these codes somewhere safe. Each code can be used once.
twoFactor.regenerateConfirm: Regenerate recovery codes? Old codes will stop working.

passkeys.title: Passkeys
passkeys.copy: Use biometrics or a device PIN to sign in without a password.
passkeys.notSupported: Passkeys are not supported on this device.

emails.title: Emails
emails.copy: Manage the emails you can use to sign in.
emails.primaryHint: To change your primary email, add and verify another email, then make it primary (requires password).
emails.googleWarning: Google is linked. Unlink it below before switching primary email.
emails.verificationSent: Verification code sent. Enter it below to verify.
emails.makePrimaryPasswordRequired: Confirm your password to switch primary email.

google.title: Google
google.copy: Linking Google lets you sign in faster. We never post without permission.
google.passwordRequiredLink: Enter your password to link Google.
google.startLinkError: Could not start Google link flow.
google.passwordRequiredUnlink: Enter your password to unlink Google.

payment.title: Payment methods
payment.stripeKeyMissing: Stripe publishable key is not configured
payment.missingPaymentMethod: Payment method missing from setup intent.

devices.title: Devices
devices.copy: Review where you're signed in. If something looks unfamiliar, sign out of other devices.
devices.noneRevoked: No other devices to sign out.
devices.revokeError: Could not sign out other devices.

activity.title: Recent activity
activity.copy: Sign-ins and security changes for your account.

session.title: Session
session.copy: You will be logged out after inactivity to keep your account safe.
session.expired: Session expired. Please sign in again.
session.idleLogout: You have been logged out due to inactivity.

overview.title: Overview
overview.noOrdersCopy: Your recent orders will appear here.
overview.noAddressesCopy: Add a shipping address for faster checkout.

support.title: Support
support.hint: View your ticket threads and replies.
support.noneCopy: Your support threads will appear here.
support.loadErrorCopy: Open your support inbox to see your threads.

return.title: Return
return.hint: Select quantities and tell us why you want to return these items.
return.reasonPh: Tell us why you want to return these items…

errors.notEligible: This order isn't eligible for returns yet.
errors.alreadyExists: A return request already exists for this order.
errors.itemsRequired: Select at least one item to return.

cancel.title: Cancellation
cancel.hint: Tell us why you want to cancel this order. We'll review it as soon as possible.
cancel.reasonPh: Tell us why you want to cancel…

errors.notEligible: This order can't be cancelled anymore.
errors.alreadyRequested: You already requested cancellation for this order.

orders.receiptRevokeConfirm: Revoke previously shared receipt links for this order?

refund.manualRequiredCopy: This order was cancelled after payment was captured. Our team will process a refund manually.
refund.manualRequiredHint: If you have questions, contact support.

confirm.removeSelected: Remove selected items from your wishlist?

coupons.copiedCopy: Paste it in the checkout promo box.

completeProfile.title: Complete your profile
completeProfile.copy: To continue, please fill in the required details below.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.transactionalCopy: Order updates and security emails are always sent. Preferences below only affect optional community/admin and marketing emails.
notifications.replyLabel: Email me when someone replies to my blog comment.
notifications.adminLabel: Email me when new blog comments are posted (admin).
notifications.marketingLabel: Email me occasional product updates and news.
notifications.previewReply:
New reply to your comment on: Example post
From: Alex

Thanks for your message!

View: https://momentstudio.ro/blog/example
notifications.previewAdmin:
New comment on: Example post
From: Sam

Great work!

Review: https://momentstudio.ro/admin
notifications.previewMarketing: New collection: Spring ceramics\nSee what's new: https://momentstudio.ro/shop

blog.title: Blog

preview.banner: Preview mode — this post is not published yet.

blog.emptyCopy: Check back soon for new articles.
blog.noResultsCopy: Try clearing filters or searching for something else.
blog.metaDescription: Stories, updates, and behind-the-scenes from momentstudio.
blog.seriesMetaDescription: Posts in the "{{series}}" series on momentstudio.

post.shareCopyErrorCopy: Please copy the URL from the address bar.
post.errorCopy: Please try again in a moment.
post.metaDescription: Read the latest article on momentstudio.

comments.title: Comments ({{count}})
comments.followEnabledCopy: You'll get emails when new comments are posted on this article.
comments.followDisabledCopy: You won’t receive comment update emails for this article.
comments.followVerifyCopy: Verify your email address to subscribe to comment updates.
comments.empty: No comments yet. Be the first to start the discussion.
comments.reportPrompt: Optionally add a reason (spam, abuse, etc.):
comments.hidden: This comment was hidden by moderators.
comments.signInPrompt: Sign in to join the discussion
comments.rateLimitedCopy: Please wait a moment and try again.
comments.linkLimitCopy: Please remove some links and try again.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.copy: Get occasional updates from momentstudio. No spam.
newsletter.successCopy: Thanks — check your inbox to confirm your subscription.
newsletter.alreadyCopy: You’re already subscribed. If you haven’t confirmed yet, check your inbox.

admin.loadErrorCopy: Could not load admin post details.

confirm.title: Newsletter confirmation
confirm.errorCopy: We couldn’t confirm your subscription. Please try again.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.prompt: Unsubscribe from marketing emails from momentstudio?
unsubscribe.successCopy: You won’t receive marketing emails from us anymore.
unsubscribe.errorCopy: We couldn’t unsubscribe you. Please try again.

home.headline: Build the momentstudio storefront experience.
home.subhead: A crisp Angular starter with Tailwind design tokens, shared components, and a responsive shell ready for product, cart, and content flows.
home.metaDescription: Discover handcrafted ceramics with curated collections, rich product detail, and smooth checkout.

cards.strict: Angular standalone setup with strict TypeScript and routing baked in.
cards.tokens: Utility-first styling with a small token palette to keep UI consistent.
cards.primitives: Buttons, inputs, cards, modals, and toast scaffolding ready to wire.
cards.shell: Global error route, responsive header/footer, and space for store pages.

shop.title: Shop
shop.priceHint: Adjust sliders or inputs to refine results.
shop.tryAdjust: Try adjusting filters or search terms.
shop.errorTitle: We hit a snag loading products.
shop.errorCopy: Check your connection or retry in a moment.
shop.metaDescription: Browse handcrafted ceramic pieces by momentstudio. Filter by category, price, and tags.

product.notifyBackInStock: Notify me when back in stock
product.notifyRequiresSignInBody: Please sign in to request back-in-stock notifications.
product.notifyRequestedBody: We'll email you when {{name}} is available.
product.notifyCanceledBody: You won't receive back-in-stock emails for {{name}}.
product.uniqueness: Each piece is hand-thrown and glazed, so subtle variations in color and form are intentional. Expect one-of-a-kind character in every item.
product.loadErrorCopy: Check your connection and try again.
product.metaDescriptionFallback: Discover {{name}} — a handcrafted piece from momentstudio.

cart.title: Your cart
cart.emptyCopy: Browse the shop to add items.
cart.emptyFromCheckout: Your cart is empty — add items to continue checkout.
cart.moveToWishlistFailed: Could not add item to wishlist.
cart.saveForLaterFailed: Could not save item for later.
cart.moveToCartFailed: Could not move item to cart.
cart.confirmClear: Clear your cart? This will remove all items.

checkout.title: Checkout
checkout.cartSyncError: Could not sync cart with server.
checkout.cartLoadError: Could not load cart from server.
checkout.stockOnlyLeft: Only {{count}} left of {{name}}. Please reduce quantity.
checkout.paymentNotReady: Payment not initialized yet. Please wait.
checkout.paymentConfirmError: Payment confirmation failed. Please try again.
checkout.name: Full name
checkout.saveAddress: Save this address for next time
checkout.deliveryLockerRequired: Please select a locker for pickup.
checkout.deliveryLockerUnavailable: Locker pickup is not available for one or more items in your cart.
checkout.courierUnavailable: This courier is not available for one or more items in your cart.

lockers.searchNoResults: No locations found for that search.
lockers.searchError: Could not search locations. Please try again.
lockers.none: No lockers found nearby. Try moving the map or increasing the area.
lockers.error: Could not load lockers. Please try again.
lockers.noGeolocation: Geolocation is not available in this browser.
lockers.geoDenied: Could not access your location. Please allow location access and try again.

checkout.invoiceVatHint: Optional. Include country prefix if applicable (e.g., RO12345678).
checkout.paymentMethodUnavailable: This payment method is not available for your current cart.
checkout.analyticsOptInCopy: Helps us understand the checkout funnel (sessions → cart → checkout → orders). You can disable anytime in Account → Privacy.
checkout.paypalCaptureFailed: Could not confirm PayPal payment. Please try again.
checkout.paypalCancelledCopy: No payment was made. You can return to checkout and try another method.
checkout.stripeConfirmFailed: Could not confirm Stripe payment. Please try again.
checkout.stripeCancelledCopy: No payment was made. You can return to checkout and try another method.
checkout.netopiaConfirmFailed: Could not confirm Netopia payment. Please try again.
checkout.netopiaCancelledCopy: No payment was made. You can return to checkout and try another method.
checkout.successCopy: We emailed you a confirmation. You can continue shopping or view your orders.
checkout.successNoSummary: Order summary is not available yet. Please check your account for details.
checkout.promoPending: Promo {{code}} will be validated at checkout.
checkout.couponRulesSubtotal: Coupons apply to the subtotal only (shipping/VAT aren’t discounted).
checkout.couponRulesSaleItems: Some coupons don’t apply to sale items.
checkout.couponMinSubtotalRemaining: Add {{amount}} RON more to reach the {{min}} RON minimum subtotal.

couponReasons.no_eligible_items: No eligible items in your cart
couponReasons.scope_no_match: No eligible products in your cart

auth.resetRequestCopy: Enter your email and we'll send a reset link.
auth.emailVerificationNeeded: Email verification needed to place orders.
auth.name: Name
auth.displayNameHintEmpty: Your public label preview will appear here (e.g. Ana#0 (ana2005l)).
auth.displayNameHintPartial: Enter both display name and username to preview your public label.
auth.phoneHint: Enter digits only (no spaces); we’ll add the country code automatically.
auth.errorLogin: Unable to login. Please try again.
auth.errorRegister: Unable to register. Please try again.
auth.errorReset: Unable to reset password. Please try again.
auth.passkeyNotSupported: Passkeys are not supported on this device.
auth.passkeyError: Could not sign in with passkey. Please try again.
auth.googleError: Google sign-in failed. Please try again.
auth.completeProfileRequiredCopy: Please provide a few required details in your account before continuing.
auth.googleLinkPasswordMissing: Password required to link Google account.
auth.languageNotSavedDetail: Could not update your preferred language. Please try again.
auth.acceptTermsPrefix: I have read and accept the
auth.acceptPrivacyPrefix: I have read and accept the
auth.currentPasswordRequired: Current password is required to change your username.
auth.twoFactorCopy: Enter the code from your authenticator app (or a recovery code).
auth.twoFactorMissing: Two-factor session missing. Please sign in again.

validation.usernameInvalid: Username must be 3–30 characters and may include letters, numbers, '.', '_', '-'.
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters.

feedback.title: Send feedback
feedback.subtitle: Creates an internal support ticket for the team.
feedback.hint: Use this to report bugs, UX issues, or improvement ideas. The message will appear in the Support inbox under “Feedback”.
feedback.messagePlaceholder: What happened? What did you expect? Steps to reproduce…
feedback.contextPlaceholder: Extra details (order ID, affected page, screenshots reference)…

categories.dragHint: Drag to reorder categories. Click Edit to rename (RO/EN).
categories.namesRequired: Please provide both RO and EN names.
categories.mergeSelectTarget: Select a category to merge into.
categories.mergeReasonParent: Categories must share the same parent.
categories.mergeReasonChildren: This category has subcategories. Merge/remove them first.
categories.confirmMerge: Merge "{{source}}" into "{{target}}"? This will move {{count}} products and delete "{{source}}".
categories.deletePreviewError: Could not check whether the category can be deleted.

products.reorderHint: Drag product cards to reorder this category.

images.metaHint: Alt text and captions are bilingual (RO/EN).

errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.

uiPreset.title: Preset
uiPreset.hint: Owner (basic) hides inventory, ops, users, and other technical areas.

security.mfaRequired: Two-factor authentication or a passkey is required for admin access.

onboarding.title: Welcome
onboarding.subtitle: A quick checklist to get your store ready.
onboarding.intro: Use these shortcuts to configure the essentials. You can reopen this tour anytime from the dashboard.

steps.contentCopy: Update the homepage and content pages.
steps.shippingCopy: Review shipping rules and try the shipping simulator.
steps.paymentsCopy: Check provider webhooks and test a checkout flow.
steps.taxesCopy: Configure VAT/tax groups and checkout pricing.

pii.notAuthorized: You don't have permission to reveal PII.

customerTimeline.title: Customer timeline
customerTimeline.subtitle: Recent orders, support tickets, and email activity.
customerTimeline.emailGated: Reveal PII to load email activity.

ipBypass.title: Admin access restricted
ipBypass.copy: Admin access is restricted by IP. Enter the bypass token to continue on this device.
ipBypass.restricted: Admin access is restricted from this IP. Use the bypass token or contact the owner.

inventory.title: Inventory
inventory.hint: Low-stock restock list with reserved stock visibility.

reservations.emptyCarts: No active carts reserve this item.
reservations.emptyOrders: No open orders reserve this item.

bulkAdjust.selectAll: Select all items on this page

errors.noteRequired: Add an audit note to explain the adjustment.

whatsNew.title: What’s new
whatsNew.subtitle: Release notes from the latest deploy.

salesMetric.tooltip: Gross sales includes paid/shipped/delivered/refunded orders. Net sales subtracts refunds (including partial refunds).

funnel.title: Funnel (opt-in)
funnel.note: Counts are based on users who opted in to anonymous usage analytics.

config.title: Alert thresholds
config.subtitle: Tune which anomalies should surface as alerts (owner-only).
config.successCopy: Dashboard alerts update immediately based on the new thresholds.

refundsBreakdown.title: Refunds breakdown
refundsBreakdown.missingHint: Orders marked refunded without a refund record.

channelAttribution.title: Channel attribution
channelAttribution.note: Attribution is derived from opt-in analytics (session_start UTM tags).
channelAttribution.empty: No attributed orders in this range.

scheduledRunNow.title: Run now
scheduledRunNow.skippedCopy: A report for this period was already sent (use Force to re-send).

rangeErrors.missing: Select both start and end dates.
rangeErrors.order: End date must be on/after start date.

recent.title: Recently viewed
recent.hint: Quickly reopen pages and items you visited.

favorites.title: Favorites
favorites.hint: Pin pages and items for quick access.

jobs.title: Background jobs
jobs.hint: Track long-running exports and bulk actions.

detail.title: Submission
detail.empty: Select a message to view details.
detail.replyPlaceholder: Write a reply to the customer…
detail.solvedHint: This ticket is marked as resolved.

templates.title: Templates
templates.confirmDelete: Delete this template? This cannot be undone.

errors.required: Title and both language variants are required.

ops.title: Operations
ops.subtitle: Store operations, banners, shipping simulator, and webhooks.

health.title: Health dashboard
health.hint: Quick signals for availability and processing backlogs.

diagnostics.title: Environment diagnostics
diagnostics.hint: Configuration readiness checks for email, caching, storage, and payment webhooks.

newsletter.title: Newsletter subscribers
newsletter.hint: Download confirmed subscribers (CSV) for marketing operations.

banner.title: Maintenance banners
banner.hint: Schedule storefront announcement banners for downtime or promotions.

shipping.title: Shipping rate simulator
shipping.hint: Simulate totals for a sample subtotal and compare shipping methods.

webhooks.title: Webhook monitor
webhooks.hint: View recent provider webhooks and retry failed deliveries.

returns.title: Returns
returns.subtitle: Manage return requests and their statuses.

detail.title: Return request
detail.empty: Select a return request to view details.

returns.viewAllForOrder: View all returns for this order

create.title: Create return request
create.hint: Select quantities and capture the reason. The customer will receive an email.
create.reasonPh: Why is the customer returning these items?
create.itemsRequired: Select at least one item to return.

reports.title: Scheduled reports
reports.hint: Weekly/monthly email summaries for sales, top products, and low stock.
reports.recipientsHint: Comma-separated emails. Leave empty to send to the owner email.

library.title: Asset library
library.hint: Browse uploaded images and reuse them across pages and settings.
library.searchPlaceholder: Search by key, URL, or alt text…
library.focalPrompt: Focal point as "x, y" percent (0–100). Example: 50, 50
library.focalErrorsFormat: Enter focal point as "x, y" with values between 0 and 100.
library.focalPreviewHint: Click on the image to preview and set the focal point before saving.
library.usageHint: Click a key to filter the library to that scope.
library.editorHint: Creates an edited copy. The original asset stays unchanged.
library.editorRotationNote: Rotation is applied when creating the copy.
library.editorErrorsNoop: Choose at least one edit (rotate, crop, or resize).
library.uploadHint: Uploads are attached to {{key}} for easy organization.
library.confirmDelete: Delete this asset? This cannot be undone.
library.confirmDeleteWithVersions: Delete this asset and its {{count}} edited versions? This cannot be undone.

navigation.title: Site navigation
navigation.hint: Manage storefront header/footer links. Each link needs a URL plus labels in both EN and RO.
navigation.dragHint: Drag to reorder links. Use ↑/↓ for precise moves.

confirms.resetDefaults: Reset navigation to defaults? This will overwrite your current edits.

errors.invalid: Each link must have URL + Label (EN) + Label (RO), or be left completely blank.

company.title: Company info
company.hint: Displayed in the storefront footer and used for compliance. Fill in all fields before going live.

errors.required: Please fill in all required fields.

checkout.title: Checkout settings
checkout.hint: Shipping uses these values. Free shipping applies when subtotal minus discounts is at or above the threshold.
checkout.roundingHint: Controls how cart/checkout totals are rounded to 2 decimals.

sitemapPreview.title: Sitemap preview
sitemapPreview.hint: Shows the exact URLs included in sitemap.xml per language.

structuredData.title: Structured data validator
structuredData.hint: Checks product/page JSON-LD prerequisites and flags common issues.
structuredData.summary: {{errors}} errors, {{warnings}} warnings across {{products}} products and {{pages}} pages.

errors.load: Could not run structured data validation.

legal.title: Legal pages
legal.hint: Edit the Terms, Privacy Policy, and ANPC pages (EN + RO).

builder.title: Page builder blocks
builder.hint: Optional: build richer About/Contact pages with blocks. If blocks are present, the storefront renders them instead of the Markdown body.
builder.publishAtHint: If this is in the future and status is published, the page will go live at that time.
builder.unpublishAtHint: If set, the page will be hidden after this time.
builder.requiresLoginHint: When enabled, only signed-in users can view this page (it will not appear in the sitemap).

errors.blockTypeNotAllowed: This block type isn't allowed in this section.

redirects.title: Redirects
redirects.hint: Redirects preserve old links after changing a page URL. Stale redirects point to missing content.
redirects.createHint: Tip: You can paste URLs like /pages/old and /pages/new.
redirects.stale: Stale redirect: target page no longer exists.

sections.title: Homepage sections order
sections.hint: Drag to reorder sections and toggle visibility.

fields.title: Title
fields.question: Question
fields.author: Author
fields.caption: Caption (optional)
fields.galleryEmpty: No images yet. Add one to display this block.
fields.productGridProductSearchPlaceholder: Search by name, SKU, or slug…

fields.publishAtHint: Set a future time to schedule publishing.
fields.unpublishAtHint: If set, the post will be hidden after this time.
fields.title: Title
fields.pinOrderHint: Pinned posts appear first on /blog. Lower numbers appear first.

cover.title: Cover image
cover.hint: If left empty, the first uploaded image will be used as the cover.

editing.title: Editing
editing.publishAtBaseOnlyHint: If this is in the future and status is published, the post will go live at that time.
editing.unpublishAtBaseOnlyHint: If set, the post will be hidden after this time.
editing.summaryHint: Used for the blog list excerpt and SEO description.
editing.toolbarTip: Tip: Use the toolbar to format markdown and insert images (uploads go to the post's content images). Image layouts use the image title token: "wide", "left", "right", "gallery" (e.g. ![alt](url "wide")). Embeds: {{product:slug}}, {{category:slug}}, {{collection:slug}}.

a11y.title: Accessibility checks
a11y.hint: Add meaningful alt text for images (used for captions and screen readers) before publishing.
a11y.confirmPublishAnyway: This post has {{count}} image(s) without meaningful alt text. Publish anyway?

seo.title: SEO preview
seo.hint: Previews the title/description snippets for search and social. Character counts are approximate and may truncate differently per device.
seo.missingLang: No content found for this language yet.

issues.titleTooLong: Title is long ({{count}} chars) and may truncate.
issues.descriptionTooLong: Description is long ({{count}} chars) and may truncate.
issues.derivedFromBody: No summary set; description is derived from body content.
issues.previewTokenRecommended: Generate a preview token to validate OG images for drafts.

pins.title: Pinned posts
pins.hint: Drag to reorder pinned posts. Lower numbers appear first on /blog.
pins.saveConflict: Pinned slot #{{slot}} is already used by "{{title}}". Unpin it or choose another slot.

social.title: Social preview
social.hint: Preview OpenGraph images and URLs per language (EN/RO). Social platforms require the published URL for real sharing.
social.previewTokenCopy: Generate a preview link to render social images for draft/review posts.

confirms.rollback: Rollback to version {{version}}? This will overwrite the current draft.

confirms.deleteComment: Delete this comment? This removes its body for everyone.

bulk.previewEmpty: Select posts and choose an action to preview changes.
bulk.invalidSchedule: Unpublish time must be after publish time.
bulk.loadError: Could not load some posts for bulk update.

errors.slugRequiredCopy: Adjust the title to include letters or numbers (slug is auto-generated).
errors.loadContent: Could not load blog post content
errors.translationMetaSave: Saved translation, but could not save metadata

fx.title: FX rates
fx.hint: Used for approximate EUR/USD display; all prices and payments remain in RON.
fx.asOfHint: Leave empty to use today's date on the server.

audit.title: Override audit
audit.hint: Recent override changes with restore tooling.

errors.invalid: Enter positive EUR/USD per RON rates.

taxes.groupsHint: Configure VAT rates by country and assign tax groups to categories.
taxes.name: Name

errors.deleteDefault: Cannot delete the default tax group.
errors.rateInvalid: Enter a valid country code and VAT rate.
errors.categoryAssign: Could not update category tax group.

products.title: Products
products.hint: Search by name, URL, or product code (SKU).

desc.basics: Fill out the essentials: name, category, price, and stock.
desc.content: Add a description and any translations (RO/EN).
desc.save: Save to create the product. This unlocks images and translations.
desc.images: Upload at least one photo and add alt text.
desc.publish: When you're ready, set Status to Published and save again.
desc.review: Check content and translations before publishing.

help.subtitle: Quick guide to managing products.
help.mediaAlt: Example view of the products list (tabs, bulk actions, quick actions).

points.search: Use Search + filters to find products by name, URL, or SKU.
points.bulk: Select rows to unlock bulk actions (sale, category, scheduling, price changes).
points.columns: Use “Table layout” to show/hide columns and switch density.
points.wizard: Use “Guided wizard” when creating or publishing to follow a step-by-step flow.

confirmDeleteImage.title: Delete this image?
confirmDeleteImage.subtitle: This hides the image from the product gallery.

points.storefront: It will no longer appear on the storefront (gallery and social previews).
points.restore: You can restore it later from “Show deleted”.
points.metadata: Alt text and captions for this image will be removed from the gallery.

points.published: Publishing can make this product visible to customers (if Active is enabled).
points.draft: Draft products are hidden from the storefront.
points.archived: Archived products are hidden from the storefront but remain in admin history.
points.audit: This change will be recorded in the audit trail.

form.slugHelp: Auto-generated from the name. Used in the product link.
form.priceFormatHint: Use numbers and a dot with up to 2 decimals (example: 123.45).
form.skuHint: Optional. Useful for inventory, exports, and internal tracking.
form.shortDescriptionHint: Shown in product cards and listings (max 280 characters).
form.advancedHint: Shipping, scheduling, badges, and other optional settings.
form.altHelperHint: Shows images that still look like auto-generated filenames. Click Edit to update RO/EN alt text and captions.
form.variantsHint: Optional variants with their own pricing and stock.
form.stockLedgerHint: Record stock changes with a reason for better traceability.

sale.title: Sale
sale.note: Changing sale pricing forces the product back to Draft until republished.
sale.startRequired: Choose a sale start date when auto-publish is enabled.
sale.valueHint: Use numbers and a dot with up to 2 decimals (example: 10.00).
sale.amountTooHighHint: Discount cannot exceed the base price.

bulk.note: Applying sale pricing forces products back to Draft. Use “Apply status” once you're ready.

status.title: Change status for {{count}} products?
status.subtitle: This updates storefront visibility.
status.undoHint: Tip: after applying, you can Undo for a short time.

priceAdjust.negative: Price change would make a price negative.

errors.stockInvalid: Stock must be a whole number ≥ 0.

translations.title: Translations
translations.hint: Optional per-language overrides. If empty, the storefront falls back to the default fields.
translations.diffHint: Compare RO/EN fields at a glance and spot missing or identical text quickly.

duplicates.title: Potential duplicates
duplicates.slugTaken: Slug '{{slug}}' is already used. This product will be created as '{{suggested}}'.
duplicates.mergeHint: If these refer to the same item, consider updating the existing product instead of creating a new one.

seoPreview.title: SEO & preview
seoPreview.hint: See how this product may appear in listings and search results per language.

csv.title: CSV import
csv.hint: Upload a products CSV (use Export as a template). Run a dry-run first, then import if there are no errors.

markdownPreview.title: Preview
markdownPreview.sanitizedWarning: Some HTML was removed for safety. Review the preview output.

errors.endBeforeStart: Badge end must be after badge start.

shipping.title: Shipping
shipping.hint: Shipping class and delivery exceptions for this product.
shipping.disallowedHint: If you disallow both couriers, customers will not be able to checkout this product.
shipping.weightHint: Weight must be a non-negative integer (grams).

priceHistory.title: Price history
priceHistory.hint: Base price changes over time. Sale windows are highlighted.

audit.title: Audit trail
audit.hint: Recent product changes with per-field history.

relationships.title: Relationships
relationships.hint: Curate related products and upsells shown on the storefront.
relationships.saveFirst: Save the product first to manage relationships.

categories.title: Categories

wizard.title: Guided setup: add category
wizard.addFirst: Add the category first to continue.

desc.basics: Give the category a name and optional parent, then add it.
desc.translations: Add RO and EN translations so the category displays in both languages.

help.subtitle: Quick guide to managing categories.
help.mediaAlt: Example view of the categories manager (tree, fields, translations).

points.slug: Slugs are generated from the name and used in URLs.
points.parent: Use Parent category to build a hierarchy (optional).
points.translations: Add RO/EN translations for storefront navigation and filtering.

csv.title: Bulk import (CSV)
csv.hint: Upload a CSV to create/update categories. Use Dry run first to validate.
csv.formatHint: Columns: slug, name, parent_slug, sort_order, is_visible, description, name_ro, description_ro, name_en, description_en.

confirmDelete.title: Delete category "{{name}}"?
confirmDelete.subtitle: This permanently removes the category from the storefront.

points.inUse: If products still use this category, deletion may fail — reassign products first.
points.urls: Links that include this category slug may break.

categories.slugAutoHint: Slug is auto-generated from the name.

translations.title: Translations
translations.hint: Optional per-language overrides shown on the storefront.

orders.title: Orders
orders.hint: Search by reference, id, email, or username.

kanban.hint: Drag cards between columns to update status. Switch back to the table for bulk actions.

exports.title: Order documents
exports.hint: Recent packing slips, receipts, and shipping labels created in admin.

help.subtitle: Quick guide to managing orders.
help.mediaAlt: Example view of the orders list (search, status filters, export).

points.status: Use Status to focus on pending/payment/shipped states.
points.tags: Use Tags like vip/gift/test to triage and filter faster.
points.export: Use Export CSV to download orders, or save templates for recurring exports.

exportModal.title: Export orders
exportModal.hint: Pick columns or use a saved template.

errors.chooseAction: Choose a status or courier to apply.
errors.chooseTagAction: Choose a tag to add or remove.

shippingLabelsModal.title: Shipping labels
shippingLabelsModal.hint: {{count}} selected order(s). Upload one label per order (PDF/PNG/JPG/WebP).
shippingLabelsModal.chooseFilesHint: Tip: include the order reference in the filename for auto-match.

errors.missingOrder: Select an order for this file.
errors.zipFailed: Could not download shipping labels ZIP.

orders.confirmDeleteLabel: Delete the shipping label for this order?
orders.saveHint: Updates status and tracking; emails send on status changes.

receiptLinks.title: Receipt links
receiptLinks.confirmRevoke: Revoke all shared receipt links for this order?

orders.cancelReasonHint: Required when cancelling. Shown to the customer and included in the cancellation email.
orders.refundHint: Refund is manual; this records an event and notifies the owner inbox.
orders.confirmRefund: Request a refund for this order?

refundWizard.title: Request refund
refundWizard.notePlaceholder: Required. Add a note for the audit log.

partialRefundWizard.title: Partial refund
partialRefundWizard.notePlaceholder: Required. Add a note for the audit log.
partialRefundWizard.processPaymentHintSupported: Will attempt a Stripe/PayPal refund and record the provider response.
partialRefundWizard.processPaymentHintMissingStripe: Missing Stripe payment intent id; provider refund is unavailable.
partialRefundWizard.processPaymentHintMissingPaypal: Missing PayPal capture id; provider refund is unavailable.
partialRefundWizard.processPaymentHintUnsupported: This payment method can't be refunded automatically; a manual record will be created.
partialRefundWizard.itemsRequired: Select at least one item to refund.
partialRefundWizard.amountTooHigh: Refund amount exceeds the remaining refundable amount.

addressEdit.rerateHint: Recomputes shipping totals after the address update (disabled after captured payments).

addressValidate.phoneMissing: Phone number is missing (couriers may require it).
addressValidate.phoneNonE164: Use international format for phone numbers (e.g., +40740123456).
addressValidate.postalInvalidRo: Romanian postal codes should be 6 digits.
addressValidate.postalNonStandardRo: Postal code contains extra characters; consider using digits only.

comms.title: Customer emails
comms.hint: Email delivery events related to this order (last 7 days).
comms.empty: No email events found for this order.

orders.notesPlaceholder: Write an internal note for this order…

tags.manageHint: Rename tags and set colors for faster scanning (saved per admin browser).
tags.renameConfirm: Rename "{{from}}" to "{{to}}"? This updates all affected orders.

errors.renameRequired: Choose a source and target tag.

velocity_email.title: Email velocity

country_mismatch.title: Country mismatch
country_mismatch.description: Shipping country {{shipping_country}} differs from billing country {{billing_country}}.

orders.paymentNotCapturedHint: Payment is not captured yet. Wait for payment confirmation before accepting the order.

errors.cancelReasonRequired: Cancel reason is required to cancel an order.

points.search: Use Search + Role to narrow down customers and admins.
points.pii: Use “Reveal PII” only when needed (it may unlock additional data like email activity).
points.roles: Changing roles and sensitive actions may require password confirmation.

users.rolePasswordPrompt: Confirm your password to change a user's role.
users.deleteHint: Deletes this user account (anonymizes data and revokes sessions). This action is irreversible.
users.selectHint: Select a user to manage role, sessions, and aliases.
users.ownerLocked: Owner role can only be transferred.
users.overrideVerificationPasswordPrompt: Confirm your password to mark this email as verified.

roleHints.fulfillment: Fulfillment preset: Dashboard, Orders, Returns, Inventory.
roleHints.content: Content preset: Dashboard, Content, Products, Coupons.
roleHints.admin: Owner basic: Full access (except owner-only actions).

editorMode.advancedHint: Advanced mode shows SEO, scheduling, and extra controls.

previewLinks.title: Preview

blockLibrary.title: Block library
blockLibrary.hint: Click to add a block, or drag it into the editor.

items.faq: FAQ accordion with questions and answers.
items.testimonials: Testimonials grid with quotes and authors.
items.product_grid: Shoppable product grid sourced by category, collection, or manual selection.
items.form: Contact or newsletter form with validation and success messaging.
items.image: Single image with optional link and caption.
items.gallery: Multi-image gallery with captions and focal points.
items.banner: Hero banner with headline, CTA, and background image.
items.carousel: Slider with multiple slides and autoplay settings.

errors.noImages: Drop one or more PNG/JPEG/WEBP/GIF images (max 5MB).

reusableBlocks.title: Reusable blocks
reusableBlocks.hint: Save a section and reuse it on other pages.

scheduling.title: Scheduling
scheduling.hint: Upcoming publish/unpublish times across pages, blog posts, and global banners.
scheduling.empty: No scheduled publish/unpublish events in this window.

confirms.rollback: Rollback to version {{version}}? This will overwrite the current content.

findReplace.hint: Search and replace text across CMS content (including page builder blocks). Preview before applying.

couponsV2.title: Coupons
couponsV2.subtitle: Manage promotions, coupons, and coupon assignments.

stacking.title: Stacking preview
stacking.hint: Preview how this promotion stacks with sale prices and shipping rules (scope rules still apply).
stacking.saleAllowed: Discount applies on top of sale prices
stacking.saleBlocked: Sale items are excluded from the discount
stacking.shippingNone: Does not discount shipping (free shipping threshold applies after discount)
stacking.minSubtotalWarning: Not eligible at this subtotal (min subtotal is {{min}}).
stacking.scopeNote: This preview assumes all items are in scope; included/excluded category/product rules can reduce the eligible subtotal.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.hint: Usage over time, AOV lift, and top discounted products.
analytics.empty: No redemptions in this period yet.

calendar.title: Scheduling calendar
calendar.empty: No promotions scheduled in this window.

ab.title: A/B promo test
ab.hint: Randomly assign a customer segment to two assigned coupons and compare performance.
ab.requiresAssigned: A/B testing works best with assigned coupons (visibility: assigned) to avoid leakage across groups.
ab.publicWarning: This coupon is public. Consider using assigned coupons so only the intended group can redeem it.

promotions.hint: Configure discount rules and their scope.

assignments.hint: Assign coupons to users by email and revoke when needed.

bulk.hint: Upload a CSV of customer emails (first column) to assign or revoke this coupon in bulk.

segment.title: Segment targeting
segment.hint: Target users by preferences (marketing opt-in, email verified). Runs in the background for large lists.

errors.invalidDateRange: Ends at must be after starts at

errors.amountRequired: Amount off must be greater than 0

retention.hint: Purge old audit rows based on configured retention days.
